description: Durable trekking trousers for adventures in the mountains and forest. Made from durable wind and water-resistant G-1000 Eco fabric with double layers over the rear and knees. Regular waist (mid waist) and regular fit with pre-shaped knees. Six practical pockets including a map pocket and a multitool pocket. Elastic strap adjustments with press buttons on leg endings.
name: Fjallraven Vidda Pro Trousers, Short - Mens

specs.value: Now with a more inclusive fit and boot hooks now more repairable
